name: HepatitisBVirusInfectionTestsForHepatitisBVirusSurfaceAntigen
title: Hepatitis B Virus Infection (Tests for hepatitis B virus surface Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Hepatitis B surface antigen),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Hepatitis B surface antigen),(Exclusion Criteria: Donor and panel tests)
